General.Name: HCT Co. Ltd
General.Description: HCT Co., Ltd provides test and calibration services in South Korea and internationally. The company offers test services, including testing, inspection, and certification of the devices and equipment of various industries, such as mobile, environment, shipbuilding, energy, and machinery. It also provides calibration services for measuring equipment; and management services for clean room. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Icheon-si, South Korea.
